document.heading: Fiscal Year 2017 Local Budget Act of 2016
To adopt the local portion of the budget of the District of Columbia government for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017.

history.summary: Law 21-142 adopts the Local Portion of the Fiscal Year 2017 Budget. It appropriates specified amounts from the District's General Fund for various purposes, including the funding of District agencies and Offices, and the provision of public education and human services.

document.codify:annotation: For Fiscal Year 2017 Local Budget Act of 2016, see D.C. Law 21-142.
